entry.title: Vite report on Mon, 14 Aug 2023 20:01:59
entry.summary:
Tech:
- AI is going to eliminate way more jobs than anyone realizes
- This AI Paper Proposes to Empower Pre-trained LLMs in Non-English Languages by Building Semantic Alignment Across Languages
- Full Stack Airbnb Clone with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Zustand and Amplication

Business:
- Zacks Research Research Analysts Increase Earnings Estimates for ...
- Short Interest in Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) Declines By 19.1%
- Great Ajax (NYSE:AJX) Now Covered by Analysts at StockNews.com
- 64% of investors surveyed feel unlimited vacation time could help companies beat the S&P 500 — but only 1 in 5 say this trend could actually gain traction
- Two young tech workers share why they relocated to Arkansas from Texas and California
- Mastercard to purchase a minority stake in MTNâ€™s $5.2B fintech business
- How to become a UPS driver — which now pays $170,000 a year when including benefits

AI:
- AI is going to eliminate way more jobs than anyone realizes
- This AI Paper Proposes to Empower Pre-trained LLMs in Non-English Languages by Building Semantic Alignment Across Languages

Other:
- Stability of PEth 16:0/18:1, 16:0/18:2, 16:0/20:4, 18:0/18:1, 18:0/18:2 ... - John Wiley
- Two transported after collision in Newhall - Santa Clarita Valley Signal
- Ukraine is now the 'most heavily mined country in the world,' defense minister says, as he pleads for more de-mining equipment
- I came out as trans while at Goldman Sachs. Here are 5 things I learned that can help make workplaces more welcoming for transgender people.
- Russian ruble hits 16-month low as currency takes a beating from Ukraine invasion
- Maui's wildfires are the deadliest in the US in over a century
- Donald Trump hasn't landscaped his ex Ivana Trump's grave at his Bedminster golf course, and it's now overrun by an untidy mess of weeds: report
- US tech stocks just had their first 2-week losing streak of 2023
- A Tesla owner took his Model S camping on a 19-day road trip and slept in it nearly every night
- I was put on a PIP in my director-level job and fantasized about quitting. So I quiet quit for 3 months before actually walking out.

Insights:
- AI is expected to have a significant impact on job displacement, potentially eliminating more jobs than currently anticipated.
- The use of AI in language models is being explored to enhance understanding and alignment across different languages.
- Unlimited vacation time is seen as a potential advantage for companies, but there is skepticism about its widespread adoption.
- Relocation to different states for tech workers is becoming more common, with Arkansas attracting professionals from Texas and California.
- Mastercard's investment in MTN's fintech business highlights the growing importance of financial technology.
- The stability of certain compounds is being studied in relation to their potential applications.
- Ukraine is facing significant challenges due to extensive landmines, highlighting the need for de-mining equipment.
- The Russian ruble has been negatively affected by the ongoing conflict in Ukraine.
- The wildfires in Maui have resulted in a high number of casualties, making it one of the deadliest incidents in recent history.
- The neglect of Ivana Trump's grave at a golf course owned by Donald Trump has caused controversy.
- The US tech stocks experienced a two-week losing streak, indicating potential market volatility.
- The versatility of Tesla vehicles is showcased by a Model S owner who used it for a 19-day road trip and slept in it regularly.
- Workplace experiences of transgender individuals can be improved by implementing inclusive policies and practices.
- Personal experiences of individuals facing challenges in their careers, such as being put on a Performance Improvement Plan (PIP), can provide insights into workplace dynamics and decision-making.
